title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Derisk your mainframe exit with agentic AI-powered refactoring ft BMW & Fiserv
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能AI驱动的重构降低大型机迁移风险，宝马和Fiserv案例分享
abstract: Discover how industry leaders Fiserv and BMW modernized mission-critical mainframe applications using AWS Transform's agentic AI capabilities. Learn how Fiserv implemented a mainframe modernization factory that reduced modernization time while improving code quality and maintainability of refactored applications. Through BMW's transformation journey, explore how critical systems were migrated to a new technology stack within months, achieving unprecedented speed and efficiency. This session explores AWS Transform's AI-powered capabilities—from code analysis to intelligent refactoring—and their game-changing results. Get practical insights for large-scale refactoring from organizations that have successfully modernized millions of lines of mission-critical code across diverse industries.
abstract_cn: 了解行业领导者Fiserv和BMW如何使用AWS Transform的智能AI功能现代化关键任务大型机应用程序。了解Fiserv如何实施大型机现代化工厂，在提高重构应用程序代码质量和可维护性的同时缩短现代化时间。通过BMW的转型之旅，探索关键系统如何在数月内迁移到新技术栈，实现前所未有的速度和效率。本次会议探讨AWS Transform的AI驱动功能——从代码分析到智能重构——及其颠覆性成果。从成功现代化数百万行跨不同行业关键任务代码的组织中获得大规模重构的实用见解。
